p: Several questions stem from this conceptual approach. These include: (a) Did the selectivity originate in a progenitor of SARS-CoV-2 that, after contact with humans, acquired favorable genetic modifications through adaptation during undetected human-to-human transmission; (b) is this selectivity a manifest of Darwin's theory of Evolution by Natural Selection; (c) is the selectivity fixed or evolving as the virus continues to spread during the pandemic; (d) what are the implications of this selectivity on the development of an effective vaccine.
